publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7932 Bob Doris: Community Action in Possilpark—That the Parliament welcomes the joint initiative with Glasgow City Council and North Glasgow Housing Association to improve the Possilpark area; notes that a new environmental team, supported and managed by North Glasgow Housing Association, will build on the good work done by Glasgow City Council’s Land and Environmental Services staff; applauds North Glasgow Housing Association for supplementing the clean-up service with its Kick Start Futures programme, an initiative aimed at preparing young adults for employment and further training; believes that this is a good example of community action, and wishes the environmental team well for the future. Supported by: Alasdair Allan*

S3M-7932 Bob Doris: Community Action in Possilpark—That the Parliament welcomes the joint initiative with Glasgow City Council and North Glasgow Housing Association to improve the Possilpark area; notes that a new environmental team, supported and managed by North Glasgow Housing Association, will build on the good work done by Glasgow City Council’s Land and Environmental Services staff; applauds North Glasgow Housing Association for supplementing the clean-up service with its Kick Start Futures programme, an initiative aimed at preparing young adults for employment and further training; believes that this is a good example of community action, and wishes the environmental team well for the future. Supported by: Alasdair Allan, Kenneth Gibson*, Stuart McMillan*, Bill Kidd*, Anne McLaughlin*
